statements: SELECT * FROM player_demographics ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT player_name, country FROM player_demographics WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT player_id, player_name, age FROM player_demographics WHERE country='USA';
SELECT * FROM player_demographics WHERE age >= 25 AND game_preferences->>'genre'='Action';
SELECT player_id, player_name, gender FROM player_demographics WHERE country='Canada' ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT player_name, age, gender FROM player_demographics WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM player_demographics WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, age FROM player_demographics WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT player_id, country, game_preferences FROM player_demographics WHERE country = 'Canada' AND age < 30;
SELECT player_id, gender, game_preferences FROM player_demographics WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY gender, player_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM player_demographics;
SELECT player_id, age, gender FROM player_demographics ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT player_id, gender FROM player_demographics WHERE location = 'USA';
SELECT player_id, age, gender, location FROM player_demographics WHERE age >= 25;
SELECT player_id, game_id, genre FROM game_preferences WHERE rating > 8 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT player_id, age, location FROM player_demographics WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT player_id, gender, location FROM player_demographics WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY player_id;
SELECT player_id, game_id, rating FROM game_preferences WHERE genre = 'Action' ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_demographics JOIN game_preferences ON player_demographics.player_id = game_preferences.player_id WHERE genre = 'Adventure';

SELECT player_id, age, location, game_id, rating FROM player_demographics JOIN game_preferences ON player_demographics.player_id = game_preferences.player_id WHERE location = 'New York' AND rating > 3 ORDER BY age ASC, rating DESC;
SELECT player_id, age, gender, country FROM player_demographics;
SELECT country, age, gender, player_id FROM player_demographics;
SELECT * FROM game_preferences WHERE player_id = 'abc123';
SELECT * FROM game_preferences WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT player_id, recommended_game_id, score FROM personalized_recommendations;
SELECT player_id, age, gender, country FROM player_demographics WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT player_id, game_id, rating, favorite FROM game_preferences WHERE favorite = TRUE ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT player_id, recommended_game_id, score FROM personalized_recommendations WHERE score > 0.5 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT player_id, gender, country FROM player_demographics WHERE gender = 'Male' AND country = 'USA';
SELECT player_id, age, gender, country FROM player_demographics WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT * FROM player_demographics;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM player_demographics ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT player_id, country FROM player_demographics WHERE age > 25;
SELECT game_title, game_category, release_year FROM game_catalog WHERE release_year > 2010 ORDER BY release_year ASC;
SELECT player_id, recommended_game_id FROM recommendations WHERE player_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM player_demographics WHERE age > 25 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT name, age, country FROM player_demographics WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT player_id, game_title, release_year FROM game_catalog WHERE release_year BETWEEN 2000 AND 2010 ORDER BY release_year ASC;

SELECT rec_id, player_id, game_title FROM recommendations INNER JOIN game_catalog ON recommendations.recommended_game_id = game_catalog.game_id WHERE player_id IN (SELECT player_id FROM player_demographics WHERE age < 30);
SELECT player_id, SUM(gameplay_hours) AS total_hours FROM game_preferences GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_hours > 50;
SELECT player_name, age, location FROM players;
SELECT game_title, genre, release_year FROM games ORDER BY genre DESC;
SELECT player_id, game_title, rating FROM player_preferences WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT player_name, age, favorite_genre FROM players JOIN player_statistics ON players.player_id = player_statistics.player_id;
SELECT * FROM player_reviews WHERE review_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT player_name, age, gender FROM players ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT game_title, genre, release_year FROM games WHERE genre='RPG';
SELECT player_name, game_title, rating FROM players p JOIN player_preferences pp ON p.player_id = pp.player_id JOIN games g ON pp.game_id = g.game_id WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT player_name, game_title, review_text FROM players p JOIN player_reviews pr ON p.player_id = pr.player_id JOIN games g ON pr.game_id = g.game_id WHERE review_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT game_title, SUM(total_playtime) AS total_playtime FROM player_statistics ps JOIN games g ON ps.player_id = g.game_id GROUP BY game_title ORDER BY total_playtime DESC;
